Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides free information and guidance to parents/carers and other professionals about childcare and children's services in Sheffield, for children and young people aged 0-19 years. Provides personalised lists of childcare services, leisure, education and play provision in Sheffield, and a range of fact sheets. Also provides information to enquirers wanting to set up childcare provision. Has a reference library of family information and an online directory at www.asksid.net. Works in partnership to help develop new services to promote quality childcare and to raise awareness of children's rights. Information sessions are regularly delivered in community venues (check the website http://www.sheffinfolink.org.uk for dates). Also acts as an enquiry point for families with disabled children and young people wanting to find out more about the Short Breaks service. Company limited by guarantee no 3426470. Self or any referral.
